verses.verse: And there came <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> angels <S%H4397><s%> to Sodom <S%H5467><s%> at even; <S%H6153><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Sodom: <S%H5467><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> them rose up <S%H6965><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them; and he bowed himself <S%H7812><s%> with his face <S%H639><s%> toward the ground; <S%H776><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> my lords, <S%H113><s%> turn in, <S%H5493><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> into <S%H413><s%> your servant's <S%H5650><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and tarry all night, <S%H3885><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and ye shall rise up early, <S%H7925><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> on your ways. <S%H1870><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> Nay; <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> we will abide in the street all night. <S%H3885><s%> <S%H7339><s%>

And he pressed <S%H6484><s%> upon them greatly; <S%H3966><s%> and they turned in <S%H5493><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house; <S%H1004><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> them a feast, <S%H4960><s%> and did bake <S%H644><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> and they did eat. <S%H398><s%>

But before <S%H2962><s%> they lay down, <S%H7901><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> even the men <S%H376><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> round, both old <S%H2205><s%> and young, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from every quarter: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%>

And they called <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Where <S%H346><s%> are the men <S%H376><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee this night? <S%H3915><s%> bring them out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, that we may know <S%H3045><s%> them.
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, and shut <S%H5462><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him,
And said, <S%H559><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> brethren, <S%H251><s%> do not so wickedly. <S%H7489><s%> <S%H408><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I have two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> let me, I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> bring them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, and do <S%H6213><s%> ye to them as is good <S%H2896><s%> in your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> unto these <S%H411><s%> men <S%H376><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> nothing; <S%H408><s%> <S%H1697><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> came <S%H935><s%> they under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of my roof. <S%H6982><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Stand <S%H5066><s%> back. <S%H1973><s%> And they said <S%H559><s%> again, This one <S%H259><s%> fellow came in <S%H935><s%> to sojourn, <S%H1481><s%> and he will needs be a judge: <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8199><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> will we deal worse <S%H7489><s%> with thee, than <S%H4480><s%> with them. And they pressed <S%H6484><s%> sore <S%H3966><s%> upon the man, <S%H376><s%> even Lot, <S%H3876><s%> and came near <S%H5066><s%> to break <S%H7665><s%> the door. <S%H1817><s%>

But the men <S%H376><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and pulled <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to <S%H413><s%> them, and shut to <S%H5462><s%> the door. <S%H1817><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> with blindness, <S%H5575><s%> both small <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6996><s%> and great: <S%H1419><s%> so that they wearied themselves <S%H3811><s%> to find <S%H4672><s%> the door. <S%H6607><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> Hast thou here <S%H6311><s%> any <S%H4310><s%> besides <S%H5750><s%> a son-in-law, <S%H2860><s%> and thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters? <S%H1323><s%> and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast in the city, <S%H5892><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> them out of <S%H4480><s%> this place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> we <S%H587><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the cry <S%H6818><s%> of them is waxen great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H853><s%> before the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> us to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it.

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went out, <S%H3318><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his sons-in-law, <S%H2860><s%> which married <S%H3947><s%> his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Up, <S%H6965><s%> get you out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> this city. <S%H5892><s%> But he seemed <S%H1961><s%> as one that mocked <S%H6711><s%> unto <S%H5869><s%> his sons-in-law. <S%H2860><s%>

And when <S%H3644><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> arose, <S%H5927><s%> then the angels <S%H4397><s%> hastened <S%H213><s%> Lot, <S%H3876><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy wife, <S%H802><s%> and thy two <S%H8147><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> which are here; <S%H4672><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> thou be consumed <S%H5595><s%> in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And while he lingered, <S%H4102><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> laid hold <S%H2388><s%> upon his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and upon the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his wife, <S%H802><s%> and upon the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> being merciful <S%H2551><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> him: and they brought him forth, <S%H3318><s%> and set <S%H5117><s%> him without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the city. <S%H5892><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when they had brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> that he said, <S%H559><s%> Escape <S%H4422><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thy life; <S%H5315><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> not <S%H408><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> thee, neither <S%H408><s%> stay <S%H5975><s%> thou in all <S%H3605><s%> the plain; <S%H3603><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> thou be consumed. <S%H5595><s%>
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Oh, <S%H4994><s%> not <S%H408><s%> so, my Lord: <S%H136><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> hath found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> and thou hast magnified <S%H1431><s%> thy mercy, <S%H2617><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast showed <S%H6213><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me in saving <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%> to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> some evil <S%H7451><s%> take <S%H1692><s%> me, and I die: <S%H4191><s%>

Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to flee <S%H5127><s%> unto, <S%H8033><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> is a little one: <S%H4705><s%> Oh, <S%H4994><s%> let me escape <S%H4422><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> (is it <S%H1931><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> a little one?) <S%H4705><s%> and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, See, <S%H2009><s%> I have accepted <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee concerning this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> that I will not <S%H1115><s%> overthrow <S%H2015><s%> <S%H853><s%> this city, <S%H5892><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Haste <S%H4116><s%> thee, escape <S%H4422><s%> thither; <S%H8033><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> thou be come <S%H935><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> was risen <S%H3318><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> when Lot <S%H3876><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> brimstone <S%H1614><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> heaven; <S%H8064><s%>

And he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H411><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the plain, <S%H3603><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and that which grew <S%H6780><s%> upon the ground. <S%H127><s%>
But his wife <S%H802><s%> looked <S%H5027><s%> back from behind <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> him, and she became <S%H1961><s%> a pillar <S%H5333><s%> of salt. <S%H4417><s%>

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> got up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And he looked <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> and toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the plain, <S%H3603><s%> and beheld, <S%H7200><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> as the smoke <S%H7008><s%> of a furnace. <S%H3536><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when God <S%H430><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H3603><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the overthrow, <S%H2018><s%> when he overthrew <S%H2015><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the which <S%H2004><s%> <S%H834><s%> Lot <S%H3876><s%> dwelt. <S%H3427><s%>

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> out of Zoar, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6820><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him; for <S%H3588><s%> he feared <S%H3372><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Zoar: <S%H6820><s%> and he dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in a cave, <S%H4631><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

And the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the younger, <S%H6810><s%> Our father <S%H1><s%> is old, <S%H2204><s%> and there is not <S%H369><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> to come in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> us after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> let us make <S%H853><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> and we will lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%>

And they made <S%H853><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night: <S%H3915><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her father; <S%H1><s%> and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> when she lay down, <S%H7901><s%> nor when she arose. <S%H6965><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> that the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the younger, <S%H6810><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I lay <S%H7901><s%> last night <S%H570><s%> with <S%H854><s%> my father: <S%H1><s%> let us make him drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%> also; <S%H1571><s%> and go thou in, <S%H935><s%> and lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, that we may preserve <S%H2421><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> of our father. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%>

And they made <S%H853><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> also: <S%H1571><s%> and the younger <S%H6810><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and lay <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him; and he perceived <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> when she lay down, <S%H7901><s%> nor when she arose. <S%H6965><s%>
Thus were both <S%H8147><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> with child <S%H2029><s%> by their father. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%>

And the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Moab: <S%H4124><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of the Moabites <S%H4124><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the younger, <S%H6810><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ben-ammi: <S%H1151><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>
